result.purpose: This module is responsible for managing wallet preferences and providing a client interface to interact with external services.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating wallet management functionality with a clear separation of concerns between the client interface and data models.

internal/infras/walletmanager/client.go.purpose: This file defines a wallet manager client that retrieves user preferences from a specified base URL.
side_effects: Makes HTTP requests to an external service.
risks: Potential exposure of sensitive user data if not handled properly.
Error handling may not cover all edge cases.

internal/infras/walletmanager/models.go.purpose: Defines data structures for managing wallet preferences.
